ygData.subject: Re: Estate of Unrest
ygData.msgSnippet: ahhhh ok, well as a Gnome Necro I have never had a problem, I run South straight until I hit water then turn right and follow the water until I get to unrest
ygData.messageBody:
ahhhh ok, well as a Gnome Necro I have never had a problem, I run South
straight until I hit water then turn right and follow the water until I get
to unrest on my right. I went there at L12 and left when I was 16th
very nice solo from 12-16th . ..

----- Original Message -----
From: <srl@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 22, 1999 9:07 AM
Subject: SV: [EQ_Necromancer] Estate of Unrest


> From: srl@...
>
> Hmm i think he means the high elf/dwarf/gnome/wood elf at the camp on the
way to unrest....

> To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>

> Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Estate of Unrest

days
